verses.verse: If a man<WH376> shall steal<WH1589> an ox<WH7794>, or a sheep<WH7716>, and kill<WH2873> it, or sell<WH4376> it; he shall restore<WH7999> five<WH2568> oxen<WH1241> for an ox<WH7794>, and four<WH702> sheep<WH6629> for a sheep<WH7716>. or a sheep: or, or a goat
